channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tower of London reopens after apple crumble thrown at crown jewels display
item.description: Four people arrested after civil-resistance group Take Back Power protest against inequality in the UK Part of the Tower of London was temporarily clo...

item.title: Reform UK gains its first peer after Conservative party defection
item.description: Malcolm Offord was unveiled as Reform UK’s latest recruit by party leader Nigel Farage in Falkirk on Saturday Reform UK has gained its first peer afte...

item.title: Drag queen Pattie Gonia completes 100-mile trek raising $1m to make outdoors more ‘equitable’
item.description: Drag queen, environmentalist, diversity and inclusion advocate and social media star arrives in San Francisco Pattie Gonia, the drag queen and environ...

item.title: Gunmen kill at least 11 people including three-year-old in hostel in South Africa
item.description: Police launch ‘manhunt’ after 25 people are shot in early morning in township attack west of Pretoria Gunmen have stormed into a hostel in South Afric...

item.title: Zelenskyy to meet Starmer at Downing Street to discuss US draft peace deal
item.description: Emmanuel Macron and Friedrich Merz will also be present for talks on guaranteeing Ukraine’s postwar security Volodymyr Zelenskyy will visit Downing St...

item.title: Verstappen beats Norris and Piastri to pole in title decider
item.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen beats his McLaren title rivals Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri to pole position for the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.

item.title: Watch: Australia wildfire rips through homes
item.description: Multiple homes were left damaged after a wildfire swept through a coastal area north of Sydney.

item.title: Russia hits Ukraine as US reports progress in talks with Kyiv
item.description: France's president condemns the attack and announces talks in London on Monday with Ukrainian, British and German leaders.

item.title: Four arrested over defacing of Crown Jewels display case at Tower of London
item.description: The group Take Back Power says its members poured custard and apple crumble on the display.

item.title: Verstappen beats Norris and Piastri to pole
item.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen beats his McLaren title rivals Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri to pole position for the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.
